2 Story House for Sale in Thalawathugoda

This 7 Perch fully tiled house is located in a highly sought out residential area in Thalawathugoda, and is the dream home you have been looking for.
This house consists of 3 bedrooms - one on the ground floor and two on the first floor, a living room with a TV lounge area, a balcony, a dining room with a pantry & kitchen, 2 bathrooms including servant’s room & washroom which is on the ground floor.

Other Details,
 Total floor area – 2000sq.ft
 25ft wide roadway.
 Just 600m to Thalawathugoda Junction.
 300m to Pannipitiya Road.

Facilities available,
 Overhead tank – 1500ltrs.
 Solar hot water system.
 Pipe borne water.
 Parking space for 2 vehicles.

LKR 17.5 Million
